title: Digital Reality Tech
description: Digital reality tech is not just for gamers anymore! Digital Reality Tech describes the different types of digital reality and their uses. From exploring the Great Barrier Reef to allowing doctors to practice procedures in simulations, this technology can be used to change the way we live, learn, and work. This book can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast information as well as to identify adjectives.
